title: AR Rahman Feels There Is Stigma Around Musicians & Their Success Stories Are Rarely Told!
text:
AR Rahman is one of the finest musicians we have in our country today. He's not only made India proud but is also taking music on a global platform. The Oscar-winning artist who is seen performing on international podium feels there are still stigmas around musicians.

Twitter

Rahman is currently attending Busan International International Film Festival. And despite the popularity, Rahman feels the artists are made to feel like losers.

PTI

Speaking to Variety.com, Rahman says, "It's like a fairy tale, where a guy has to write 100 songs to win the girl, but it's not that simple," variety.com quoted Rahman as saying.
